item.title: Onboarding on AI Safety
item.description: I am working on activation steering with Nina Rimsky and Arjun Panickssery. You can follow the progress here. Feel free to leave suggestions or words of encouragement here.

item.title: Formal meditation practice
item.description: Working towards easily accessing the first Jhanna states. Teachers: Rob Burbea, Jhourney Team. I meditate 2 hours/day and review the sessions here. Prev experience: Vipassana retreats (Goenka, 2021/UK, 2022/USA, would love to sit another one), the realization process with Judith Blacksmith, etc. Suggestions? DM me on twitter If you have worked through the first jhannas and have suggestions, I’ll open the doc for comments. I love Rob Burbea teachings, if you think I’d appreciate a different teaching or practice, please share.
